game.name: Train Simulator: Munchen - Ingolstadt Route Add-On
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 다운로드 가능한 콘텐츠, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, Steam 트레이딩 카드, Steam 창작마당, 앱 내 구매, Steam Cloud, Steam 순위표, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: As recreated by RSSLO for Train Simulator, München - Ingolstadt captures the feel of this important transport link, and includes suitable freight and passenger haulage in the form of the DB BR182 and the ICE 3M.
game.shortDescriptionEn: As recreated by RSSLO for Train Simulator, München - Ingolstadt captures the feel of this important transport link, and includes suitable freight and passenger haulage in the form of the DB BR182 and the ICE 3M.
